Articles.Content:
I'm Kras, I once ate a Styrofoam ball.

I play Kerbal Spaced Program and make launch space planes.

Thanks for watching!

Have a great day.

Kras. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

P.S. My first attempt at a welcome post earned me a warning from a (cheeky dolphin) mod. I blame Nicki Minaj.

P.P.S. Hey.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T05:11:31Z" title="04/07/2015 05:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by Kras**

Welcome to the forums. May you have great times and less moderated posts ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Tweety

Welcome aboard, and yeah, the moderators here are quite watchful and will always help point you in the right direction. Just be careful, treat others with respect and soon enough everybody will like you. This place is truly a wonderful community!

You ate a styrofoam ball......?

Welcome to forum!

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you have a great time here. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I did eat a styrofoam ball.

Thanks for the hello, you guys are fantastic ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

Have a great forum.

Kras.

Only one? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

You just gotta try packing peanuts. They're delicious!

Or have your Kerbs eat the soccer balls from the World Cup mod ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Welcome!
